授業目的: This course aims at deliberating the basics of business and economic data analysis. In this course, the students will learn various quantitative analysis tools such as mean, mode, median, variance, standard deviation, sampling, correlations, and regressions of economic data. Simultaneously, the students will be acquainted with financial data analysis techniques such as ratio analysis, vertical and horizontal analysis, and calculation of sustainable growth.
到達目標: After completing the course, students will learn the application of statistical and financial tools and techniques for analyzing economic and financial data. The course is helpful for any business student interested in learning quantitative data analysis tools and techniques.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course will be offered in a face-to-face format. Course pedagogy includes lectures, homework, and a final report to illustrate and reinforce basic concepts. Students are expected to buy the textbook and read assigned materials prior to attending every session. The instructor will supply the reading materials in advance.Please note that if
the Covid situation worsens again and any international students are unable to enter the country (or unable to leave their home country), the instructor will offer a hybrid online class. Before the first class, the instructor will send students the lecture power points and reading materials. Please send me your email address to adhikarykobejp@gmail.com to get the necessary instructions on course-related information and reading materials.

第1回:
All 14 classes are face-to-face

Introduction and overview of the course: Understanding financial and economic data- time series, cross-section, and panel data

Please send me your email address immediately to adhikarykobejp@gmail.com
I will send you the lecture materials. For emergency, contact me on 08039854615
第3回: Measures of Central Tendency: mean, mode, median, variance, and standard deviation
第4回: Measures of Central Tendency: Z score, percentiles, quartiles, correlation, and covariance
第10回: Financial data analysis: Horizontal, vertical, and ratios analyses
第12回: Determining the sustainable growth of a firm
第13回: Understanding EVA and bankruptcy of a firm

教科書/Required texts1: Barry Render, Ralph M. Stair, Michael E. Hanna, and Trevor S. Hale
Quantitative Analysis for Management Global 13 ed.
参考書/Reference books2: Statistical Techniques in Business and Economics, 17e
